casebody.data:
CHAVIS
v.
TLC HOME HEALTH CARE. No. 531A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2006. Gregory M. Martin, J. Michael Riley, Raleigh, for Leigh Ann Chavis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of October 2005 by Defendants to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2006."
